nodes.text: The Exchange Factory Square was a industrial square controlled by the Exchange in the Upper Industrial Sector on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. The Meridian Hall and Charnax Industries were located in the area.
The Exchange Factory Square appears as part of the Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
